{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = 5GHz 160MHz 4Ã—4 802.11ac Wave 2 Module |caption2 = |pp = http://zcomax.com/ZCN-AC924.php |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = |wikipedia = |brand = Zcomax |model = AC-924 |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = November 13, 2017 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Zcomax_AC-924 |sernum = |wlclass = AC2400 |series = |if = Mini PCIe |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = |formfactor = (oversized) |vendor_id = |device_id = |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = |icid = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = |chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9984; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = U.FL |antenna = |txchains = 4 |rxchains = 4 |sstreams = 4 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam = |802.11ac = 1733 |nqam = |802.11n = 600 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 5.180~5.825 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = Yes |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = an+ac |accessible_UART = Yes |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = common |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 02/01/2017 |estreldate = |estprice = 79 |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== ===Product Key Features=== *[[Qualcomm Atheros]] "Cascade" QCA9984, 28dBm max output power *802.11ac compliant & backward compatible with 802.11an (1.73Gbps) *2 spatial streams (2SS) MIMO ''160'' and ''80+80'' MHz bandwidth support *4 spatial streams (4SS) Multi-user MIMO (MU-MIMO) *802.11ac explicit transmit beamforming (TxBF) and legacy :implicit TxBF for both beamformer and beamformee *MiniPCI Express 2.0 interface, JTAG/UART connector *Supports Spatial Multiplexing, Maximal Ratio Combining (MRC), :Cyclic-Delay Diversity (CDD), Space Time Block Code (STBC), :Low-Density Parity Check (LDPC) Codes *Supports 802.11d,e,h,i,j,k,r,u,v time stamp, w and z standards *Supports Dynamic Frequency Selection (DFS) *Designed for High Bandwidth Enterprise Wireless Access Points ==Links of Interest== [http://zcomax.com/files/AC-924-DS.pdf Datasheet] ==Pictures==
'''Retail Images''' File:AC-924-Zcomax.png File:AC-9245G-Zcomax.png
